subject: p14177219
History: -year-old male with HCV and ESRD and chronic dyspnea presents with worsening shortness of breath.
Findings: PA and lateral views of the chest. There is stable mild pulmonary vascular engorgement. No evidence of pulmonary edema. There are no focal consolidations. No pneumothorax or pleural effusion. Heart size is top normal.
Impression: Stable mild pulmonary vascular engorgement. Heart size is top normal. No evidence of pneumonia.
